body.p: This document describes how to work with Simal Core in a development environment. Simal use Maven to manage its build process. So any IDE that supports Maven can be used, that includes the command line!

section.title: Now What?
section.p: So you have Simal Core installed, now what?

Simal core comes complete with a command line interface. This is intended to be self documenting, to run it add the bindirectory of Simal core to your PATH environment variable and run simal.bat --help or simal.sh --help.
The Simal project provides a web application for working with Simal Core. You'll probably want to download that too.
Alternatively, you may be interested in building your own application on top of the Simal Core library. If this is the case then, at this early stage, we encourage you to join our mailing list .
